CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_content', false, 'iqeO2cAQLQJgnaq2MvvDKikyya6cXzeOv30s7rAf6co', 'v3.5.0--7ue83FFIHAf7kq37K05mM2rlIxLAL3q3uzSgT-I5lYE', 'qI7Tbz1i1NjawiWdTdWqA-xdLHUAIBpzpbK6wCdlN7g'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_content; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_content (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "category" TEXT NULL, "cover" VARCHAR NULL, "date" VARCHAR, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "readingTime" INT NULL, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "stem" VARCHAR, "tags" TEXT NULL, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure

",["code",{},"app/"],"ï¼š"],["pre",{"className":["language-text"],"code":"project/\nâ”œâ”€â”€ app/            # æ ¸å¿ƒåº”ç”¨é€»è¾‘\nâ”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/\nâ”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ layouts/\nâ”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ é™æ€èµ„æº\nâ””â”€â”€ server/         # æœåŠ¡ç«¯ API\n","language":"text"},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},"project/\nâ”œâ”€â”€ app/            # æ ¸å¿ƒåº”ç”¨é€»è¾‘\nâ”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ pages/\nâ”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ ç®¡ç†å†…å®¹"],"ï¼šæ–‡ç« å’Œä»£ç æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼Œç‰ˆæœ¬æ§åˆ¶æ–¹ä¾¿"],["li",{},["strong",{},"æ— éœ€æ•°æ®åº“"],"ï¼šéƒ¨ç½²ç®€å•ï¼Œé€‚åˆä¸ªäººåšå®¢"],["li",{},["strong",{},"ç±»å‹å®‰å…¨"],"ï¼šé€šè¿‡ ",["code",{},"content.config.ts"]," å®šä¹‰ schemaï¼Œç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæ•ˆ"]],["h3",{"id":"_23-è¸©è¿‡çš„å‘"},"2.3 è¸©è¿‡çš„å‘"],["p",{},"åˆšå¼€å§‹ç”¨çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œå‘ç° ",["code",{},"queryCollection(''content'')"]," è¿”å›çš„æ•°æ®ç±»å‹æ˜¯ ",["code",{},"unknown"],"ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ‰‹åŠ¨æ–­è¨€ï¼š"],["pre",{"className":"language-typescript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"// é”™è¯¯å†™æ³•\nv-if=\"article.meta?.tags?.length\"\n\n// æ­£ç¡®å†™æ³•\nv-if=\"(article.meta?.tags as string[])?.length\"\n","language":"typescript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// é”™è¯¯å†™æ³•\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"v"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"-if="],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"},"\"article.meta?.tags?.length\"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// æ­£ç¡®å†™æ³•\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"v"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"-if="],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"},"\"(article.meta?.tags as string[])?.length\"\n"]]]],["p",{},"è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜èŠ±äº†æˆ‘åŠå°æ—¶æ’æŸ¥ï¼Œåæ¥æ‰æ˜ç™½ Nuxt Content 3 çš„ç±»å‹æ¨å¯¼è¿˜ä¸å¤Ÿå®Œå–„ã€‚"],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"_3-æ ·å¼è®¾è®¡æ€è·¯"},"3. æ ·å¼è®¾è®¡æ€è·¯"],["h3",{"id":"_31-åä¸»æµè®¾è®¡"},"3.1 åä¸»æµè®¾è®¡"],["p",{},"è¯´å®è¯ï¼Œæˆ‘çœ‹è…»äº†é‚£äº›åƒç¯‡ä¸€å¾‹çš„ SaaS æ¨¡æ¿ï¼š"],["ul",{},["li",{},"ç´«è‰²åˆ°è“è‰²çš„æ¸å˜èƒŒæ™¯"],["li",{},"å¤§åœ†è§’å¡ç‰‡"],["li",{},"æ¯›ç»ç’ƒæ•ˆæœ"]],["p",{},"æ‰€ä»¥è¿™æ¬¡æˆ‘åˆ»æ„èµ°äº† ",["strong",{},"æç®€ä¸»ä¹‰"]," è·¯çº¿ï¼š"],["ul",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"ä¸»è‰²è°ƒ"],"ï¼šçº¯é»‘ ",["code",{},"#0a0a0a"]," + ç±³ç™½ ",["code",{},"#fafafa"]],["li",{},["strong",{},"ç‚¹ç¼€è‰²"],"ï¼šç¥ç€è‰² ",["code",{},"amber-500"]],["li",{},["strong",{},"æ— åœ†è§’"],"ï¼šç›´è§’è®¾è®¡ï¼Œç¡¬æœ—é£æ ¼"],["li",{},["strong",{},"ç½‘æ ¼çº¿"],"ï¼šèƒŒæ™¯åŠ ç»†å¾®ç½‘æ ¼ï¼Œå¢åŠ ç»“æ„æ„Ÿ"]],["h3",{"id":"_32-ä»£ç å—æ ·å¼"},"3.2 />\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"</"],["span",{"class":"s4JwU"},"template"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},">\n"]]]],["h2",{"id":"æ€§èƒ½åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•"},"æ€§èƒ½åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•"],["p",{},"æ ¹æ®å®˜æ–¹æµ‹è¯•ï¼ŒVue 3.6 åœ¨ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹é¢æœ‰æ‰€æå‡ï¼š"],["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{},"æŒ‡æ ‡"],["th",{},"æ”¹è¿›å¹…åº¦"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{},"åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶é—´"],["td",{},"15%"]],["tr",{},["td",{},"æ›´æ–°æ€§èƒ½"],["td",{},"20%"]],["tr",{},["td",{},"å†…å­˜å ç”¨"],["td",{},"10%"]]]],["h2",{"id":"è¿ç§»æŒ‡å—"},"è¿ç§»æŒ‡å—"],["p",{},"ä» Vue 3.5 å‡çº§åˆ° 3.6 éå¸¸ç®€å•ï¼Œåªéœ€æ›´æ–°ä¾èµ–ï¼š"],["pre",{"className":"language-bash shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"npm install vue@latest\n","language":"bash","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"svObZ"},"npm"],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"}," install"],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"}," vue@latest\n"]]]],["p",{},"å¤§å¤šæ•°é¡¹ç›®æ— éœ€ä¿®æ”¹ä»£ç å³å¯ç›´æ¥è¿è¡Œã€‚"],["h2",{"id":"æ€»ç»“"},"æ€»ç»“"],["p",{},"Vue 3.6 æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ³¨é‡æ€§èƒ½å’Œå¼€å‘è€…ä½“éªŒçš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå€¼å¾—å‡çº§ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚"],["style",{},"html pre.shiki code .s95oV, html code.shiki .s95oV{--shiki-default:#E1E4E8}html pre.shiki code .s4JwU, html code.shiki .s4JwU{--shiki-default:#85E89D}html pre.shiki code .svObZ, html code.shiki .svObZ{--shiki-default:#B392F0}html pre.shiki code .snl16, html code.shiki .snl16{--shiki-default:#F97583}html API","children":[{"id":"useid","depth":3,"text":"useId()"}]},{"id":"æ€§èƒ½åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•","depth":2,"text":"æ€§èƒ½åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•"},{"id":"è¿ç§»æŒ‡å—","depth":2,"text":"è¿ç§»æŒ‡å—"},{"id":"æ€»ç»“","depth":2,"text":"æ€»ç»“"}]}}', '["å‰ç«¯å¼€å‘"]', NULL, '2025-02-08', 'æ¢ç´¢ Vue 3.6 å¸¦æ¥çš„æ€§èƒ½æ”¹è¿›å’Œå¼€å‘ä½“éªŒä¼˜åŒ–', 'md', '{}', 'true', '/blog/vue-36-features', 5, '{"title":"Vue 3.6 æ–°ç‰¹æ€§è¯¦è§£","description":"æ¢ç´¢ INSERT INTO _content_content VALUES ('content/blog/vue3-reactive-principle.md', 'ä» Vue 3.6 å“åº”å¼åŸç†ï¼Œçœ‹ ref å’Œ reactive çš„çœŸå®åŒºåˆ«', '{"type":"minimark","value":[["h2",{"id":"å‰è¨€"},"å‰è¨€"],["p",{},"Vue 3 çš„å“åº”å¼ç³»ç»Ÿå½»åº•é‡å†™äº† Vue 2ï¼Œç”¨ Proxy + Reflect å®ç°äº†æ›´çµæ´»ã€é«˜æ•ˆçš„å“åº”å¼ã€‚"],["p",{},"åœ¨æ—¥å¸¸å¼€å‘ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šç”¨ ",["code",{},"reactive"]," å’Œ ",["code",{},"ref"]," æ¥ç®¡ç†çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œä½†å¾ˆå¤šäººåªä¼šç”¨ï¼Œä¸æ˜ç™½åŸç†ã€‚é¢è¯•æ—¶è¢«é—®åˆ° \"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ reactive è§£æ„ä¼šä¸¢å¤±å“åº”æ€§ï¼Ÿ\" å°±ç­”ä¸ä¸Šæ¥ã€‚"],["p",{},"æœ¬æ–‡å¸¦ä½ ä»åº•å±‚ç†è§£ä¸¤è€…çš„çœŸå®åŒºåˆ«ã€‚"],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"proxy-åŸç†æ¦‚è§ˆ"},"Proxy åŸç†æ¦‚è§ˆ"],["p",{},"Vue 3 æ ¸å¿ƒä¾èµ– Proxy æ¥æ‹¦æˆªå¯¹è±¡æ“ä½œï¼š"],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"const state = reactive({ count: 0 });\n\neffect(() => {\n  console.log(state.count); // track æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–\n});\n\nstate.count++; // trigger è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," state"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," reactive"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"({ count: "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," });\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"svObZ"},"effect"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"(() "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"=>"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"  console."],["span",{"class":"svObZ"},"log"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"(state.count); "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// track æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"});\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"state.count"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"++"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// trigger è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°\n"]]]],["p",{},["strong",{},"æ ¸å¿ƒæœºåˆ¶ï¼š"]],["ul",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"track"],"ï¼šå½“è®¿é—®å±æ€§æ—¶ï¼Œæ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–ï¼ˆeffectï¼‰"],["li",{},["strong",{},"trigger"],"ï¼šå½“å±æ€§å˜åŒ–æ—¶ï¼Œè§¦å‘ä¾èµ–æ›´æ–°"]],["p",{},"è¿™ä¸ªæœºåˆ¶ä¿è¯äº†è§†å›¾å’Œæ•°æ®çš„åŒæ­¥ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æ€§èƒ½æ¯” Vue 2 çš„ ",["code",{},"Object.defineProperty"]," é«˜å¾ˆå¤šã€‚"],["h3",{"id":"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ-proxy-æ›´å¥½"},"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ Proxy æ›´å¥½ï¼Ÿ"],["p",{},"Vue 2 çš„ ",["code",{},"Object.defineProperty"]," æœ‰å‡ ä¸ªç¡¬ä¼¤ï¼š"],["ol",{},["li",{},["strong",{},"æ— æ³•ç›‘å¬æ–°å¢å±æ€§"]," - å¿…é¡»ç”¨ ",["code",{},"Vue.set"]],["li",{},["strong",{},"æ— æ³•ç›‘å¬æ•°ç»„ç´¢å¼•"]," - æ•°ç»„æ“ä½œå—é™"],["li",{},["strong",{},"æ·±åº¦é€’å½’æ€§èƒ½å·®"]," - åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶éå†æ‰€æœ‰å±æ€§"]],["p",{},"Proxy ç›´æ¥ä»£ç†æ•´ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è¿™äº›é™åˆ¶ã€‚"],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"reactive-vs-ref"},"reactive vs ref"],["h3",{"id":"reactive"},"reactive"],["p",{},"ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š"],["ul",{},["li",{},"åªèƒ½åŒ…å¯¹è±¡ï¼ˆæ•°ç»„ä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¯¹è±¡ï¼‰"],["li",{},"è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ·±å±‚ Proxy"],["li",{},"è‡ªåŠ¨é€’å½’å¤„ç†å¯¹è±¡å±æ€§çš„å“åº”å¼"],["li",{},["strong",{},"è§£æ„ä¼šä¸¢å¤±å“åº”æ€§"]]],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"const state = reactive({ count: 0 });\nconst { count } = state;\n\ncount++; // âŒ ä¸å†å“åº”ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè§£æ„å‡ºæ¥çš„æ˜¯æ™®é€šå€¼\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," state"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," reactive"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"({ count: "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," });\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," { "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"count"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," } "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," state;\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"count"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"++"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// âŒ ä¸å†å“åº”ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè§£æ„å‡ºæ¥çš„æ˜¯æ™®é€šå€¼\n"]]]],["p",{},["strong",{},"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¼šè¿™æ ·ï¼Ÿ"]],["p",{},"å› ä¸º ",["code",{},"reactive"]," è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯ Proxy å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè§£æ„æ—¶ ",["code",{},"const { count } = state"]," ç›¸å½“äº ",["code",{},"const count = state.count"],"ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶å€™ ",["code",{},"count"]," åªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å­— 0ï¼Œå’Œ Proxy æ²¡å…³ç³»äº†ã€‚"],["h3",{"id":"ref"},"ref"],["p",{},"ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š"],["ul",{},["li",{},"å¯ä»¥åŒ…ä»»æ„ç±»å‹ï¼ˆå¯¹è±¡ã€æ•°ç»„ã€åŸå§‹å€¼ï¼‰"],["li",{},"å†…éƒ¨é€šè¿‡ ",["code",{},".value"]," è®¿é—®"],["li",{},"getter/setter å¤„ç† track/trigger"],["li",{},["strong",{},"è§£æ„ä¸ä¼šä¸¢å¤±å“åº”æ€§"],"ï¼ˆåªè¦ä¿æŒå¼•ç”¨ï¼‰"]],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"const num = ref(0);\nnum.value++; // âœ… å“åº”å¼æ­£å¸¸\n\n// è§£æ„ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥\nconst { value } = num;\nvalue++; // âŒ è¿™æ ·ä¸è¡Œï¼Œvalue æ˜¯åŸå§‹å€¼\n\n// æ­£ç¡®åšæ³•\nconst numRef = ref(0);\nconst update = () => {\n  numRef.value++; // âœ… å§‹ç»ˆä¿æŒå¼•ç”¨\n};\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," num"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," ref"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},");\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"num.value"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"++"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// âœ… å“åº”å¼æ­£å¸¸\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// è§£æ„ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," { "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"value"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," } "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," num;\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"value"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"++"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// âŒ è¿™æ ·ä¸è¡Œï¼Œvalue æ˜¯åŸå§‹å€¼\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// æ­£ç¡®åšæ³•\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," numRef"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," ref"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},");\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":10},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," update"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," () "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"=>"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":11},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"  numRef.value"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"++"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// âœ… å§‹ç»ˆä¿æŒå¼•ç”¨\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":12},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"};\n"]]]],["p",{},["strong",{},"ref çš„å†…éƒ¨å®ç°ï¼š"]],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"// ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆ\nfunction ref(value) {\n  return {\n    get value() {\n      track(this, ''value''); // æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–\n      return value;\n    },\n    set value(newVal) {\n      value = newVal;\n      trigger(this, ''value''); // è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°\n    }\n  };\n}\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆ\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"function"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," ref"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"s9osk"},"value"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},") {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"  return"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"    get"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," value"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"() {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"svObZ"},"      track"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"this"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},", "],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"},"''value''"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"); "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// æ”¶é›†ä¾èµ–\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"      return"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," value;\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"    },\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"    set"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," value"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"s9osk"},"newVal"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},") {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"      value "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," newVal;\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":10},["span",{"class":"svObZ"},"      trigger"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"this"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},", "],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"},"''value''"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"); "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// è§¦å‘æ›´æ–°\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":11},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"    }\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":12},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"  };\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":13},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"}\n"]]]],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"ä¿æŒ-reactive-è§£æ„å“åº”æ€§"},"ä¿æŒ reactive è§£æ„å“åº”æ€§"],["p",{},"å¦‚æœç¡®å®éœ€è¦è§£æ„ï¼Œç”¨ ",["code",{},"toRefs"],"ï¼š"],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"const state = reactive({ count: 0, name: ''Vue'' });\nconst { count, name } = toRefs(state);\n\ncount.value++; // âœ… å“åº”å¼æ­£å¸¸\nname.value = ''React''; // âœ… åŒæ ·æœ‰æ•ˆ\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," state"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," reactive"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"({ count: "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},", name: "],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"},"''Vue''"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," });\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," { "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"count"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},", "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"name"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," } "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," toRefs"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"(state);\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"emptyLinePlaceholder":true},"\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"count.value"],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"++"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// âœ… å“åº”å¼æ­£å¸¸\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"name.value "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"sU2Wk"}," ''React''"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"; "],["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// âœ… åŒæ ·æœ‰æ•ˆ\n"]]]],["p",{},["strong",{},"toRefs çš„åŸç†ï¼š"]],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"function toRefs(obj) {\n  const result = {};\n  for (const key in obj) {\n    result[key] = {\n      get value() { return obj[key]; },\n      set value(v) { obj[key] = v; }\n    };\n  }\n  return result;\n}\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"function"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," toRefs"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"s9osk"},"obj"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},") {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"  const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," result"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," {};\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"  for"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," ("],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," key"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," in"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," obj) {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":4},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"    result[key] "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," {\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":5},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"      get"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," value"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"() { "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"return"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," obj[key]; },\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"      set"],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," value"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"s9osk"},"v"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},") { obj[key] "],["span",{"class":"snl16"},"="],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," v; }\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":7},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"    };\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"  }\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":9},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"  return"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"}," result;\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":10},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"}\n"]]]],["p",{},"æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šå°±æ˜¯æŠŠ reactive å¯¹è±¡çš„æ¯ä¸ªå±æ€§éƒ½è½¬æˆ refã€‚"],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¼šæœ‰è¿™ç§è®¾è®¡"},"ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¼šæœ‰è¿™ç§è®¾è®¡"],["p",{},"ç†è§£è®¾è®¡åŠ¨æœºï¼Œæ¯”æ­»è®°ç¡¬èƒŒæ›´é‡è¦ï¼š"],["h3",{"id":"_1-proxy-é€‚åˆå¯¹è±¡ref-é€‚åˆå•å€¼"},"1. Proxy é€‚åˆå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œref é€‚åˆå•å€¼"],["ul",{},["li",{},["code",{},"reactive"]," æ˜¯ Proxy çš„åŒ…è£…ï¼Œå¤©ç„¶é€‚åˆå¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡"],["li",{},["code",{},"ref"]," æ˜¯ getter/setter çš„åŒ…è£…ï¼Œé€‚åˆåŸå§‹å€¼å’Œç®€å•åœºæ™¯"]],["h3",{"id":"_2-ç»„åˆå¼-api-çš„çµæ´»æ€§"},"2. ç»„åˆå¼ API çš„çµæ´»æ€§"],["pre",{"className":"language-javascript shiki shiki-themes github-dark","code":"// ç”¨ ref æ›´çµæ´»\nconst count = ref(0);\nconst double = computed(() => count.value * 2);\n\n// ç”¨ reactive æ›´ç»“æ„åŒ–\nconst state = reactive({\n  count: 0,\n  double: computed(() => state.count * 2)\n});\n","language":"javascript","meta":"","style":""},["code",{"__ignoreMap":""},["span",{"class":"line","line":1},["span",{"class":"sAwPA"},"// ç”¨ ref æ›´çµæ´»\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":2},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," count"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," ref"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"("],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},");\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":3},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," æ›´ç»“æ„åŒ–\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":6},["span",{"class":"snl16"},"const"],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"}," state"],["span",{"class":"snl16"}," ="],["span",{"class":"svObZ"}," "],["span",{"class":"sDLfK"},"0"],["span",{"class":"s95oV"},",\n"]],["span",{"class":"line","line":8},["span",{"class":"s95oV"},"  double: Proxy çš„å‰¯ä½œç”¨"],["p",{},"ä¸æ˜¯ Vue çš„ bugï¼Œæ˜¯è¯­è¨€ç‰¹æ€§å†³å®šçš„ã€‚Vue æä¾› ",["code",{},"toRefs"]," æ¥è§£å†³ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯æ”¹å˜ Proxy ",["code",{},"ref"]],["li",{},"é¿å…ä¸å¿…è¦çš„è§£æ„"]],["hr",{}],["h2",{"id":"æ€»ç»“"},"æ€»ç»“"],["table",{},["thead",{},["tr",{},["th",{},"ç‰¹æ€§"],["th",{},"ref"],["th",{},"reactive"]]],["tbody",{},["tr",{},["td",{},"æ•°æ®ç±»å‹"],["td",{},"ä»»æ„"],["td",{},"ä»…å¯¹è±¡/æ•°ç»„"]],["tr",{},["td",{},"è®¿é—®æ–¹å¼"],["td",{},["code",{},".value"]],["td",{},"ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®"]],["tr",{},["td",{},"è§£æ„å“åº”æ€§"],["td",{},"ä¿æŒï¼ˆå¼•ç”¨ï¼‰"],["td",{},"ä¸¢å¤±"]],["tr",{},["td",{},"åº•å±‚å®ç°"],["td",{},"getter/setter"],["td",{},"Proxy"]],["tr",{},["td",{},"é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯"],["td",{},"åŸå§‹å€¼ã€ç®€å•çŠ¶æ€"],["td",{},"å¤æ‚å¯¹è±¡ã€è¡¨å•"]]]],["p",{},["strong",{},"æ ¸å¿ƒç†è§£ï¼š"]],["ol",{},["li",{},"Vue
